# shoehorn_user_role (Resource)

Manages a Shoehorn user role assignment. Creates a role binding between a user and a role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Assign a role to a user
resource "shoehorn_user_role" "admin_user" {
  user_id = "user-abc-123"
  role    = "admin"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role` (String) The role to assign to the user (e.g., admin, editor, viewer).
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user to assign the role to.

### Read-Only

- `email` (String) The email of the user (read-only, populated from API).
- `id` (String) Composite identifier in the format user_id:role.
